Improvements.Improvement: Use constants for repeated string values
Improvements.Description: Repeated string values like 'relationshipEntity/{relationshipEntityId}/' can be replaced with a constant to avoid potential typos and make the code cleaner and more maintainable.

Improvements.Improvement: Refactor duplicate code into helper method
Improvements.Description: Duplicate code where the same checks and assertions are performed multiple times can be refactored into a helper method. This reduces the amount of code and increases readability and maintainability.
